code: import{combineReducers}from"redux";import{persistReducer}from"redux-persist";import storage from"redux-persist/lib/storage";import AuthReducer from"./auth";import userDataReducer from"./userData";import chapterReducer from"./chapter";var persistConfig={key:"root",storage:storage,whitelist:["userDataReducer"]};export var rootReducer=combineReducers({AuthReducer:AuthReducer,userDataReducer:userDataReducer,chapterReducer:chapterReducer});export default persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);
